title: NTPC generates 219.94 billion units in H1 FY25, up 3.9% on year
description: NTPC Ltd generated 219.94 billion units in the first half of FY25, showing a 3.91% growth. Coal stations recorded a 76.3% plant load factor. The company's mining division produced over 19 million tonnes of coal with a 20% growth. NTPC aims to enhance renewable energy with 25 GW projects in Rajasthan via NTPC Green Energy Ltd.
